TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ManipulationDelta extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含操作事件发生时聚合的转换数据。

span.span: Contains transformation data that is accumulated when manipulation events occur.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含有关操作位置的更改的信息。The class contains information about the changes in the position of a manipulation. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 将更改解释为 、或 。interprets the changes as a , , or . 当 上发生 事件时，请使用 对象上的属性来转换应操作的对象。When the event occurs on a , use the properties on a object to transform the object that should be manipulated. 类提供 类型的两个属性： 和 。The class provides two properties of type : and . 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview). 有关响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练：创建你的第一个 Touch 应用程序](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application). ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 该示例应用 、和 属性来移动、调整大小和旋转 。The example applies the , , and properties to move, resize, and rotate a . 本示例摘自[演练：创建您的第一个 Touch 应用程序](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application)中的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application). summary.span: 获取或设置操作调整的量，用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]表示。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount the manipulation has resized in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
The amount the manipulation has resized in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 属性都报告调整大小操作。The and properties both report a resizing manipulation. 二者之间的差异在于报告值的方式。The difference between the two is the way in which the value is reported. 属性在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]中报告调整大小操作。The property reports the resizing manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]. 属性将值报告为乘数。The property reports the value as a multiplier. 如果 为0.5，则将操作解释为将大小减小50%。If is 0.5, the manipulation is interpreted as decreasing the size by 50 percent. 如果 为2，则将操作解释为将大小增加100%。If is 2, the manipulation is interpreted as increasing the size by 100 percent.

summary.span: 获取或设置操作的旋转度数。

span.span: Gets or sets the rotation of the manipulation in degrees.
The rotation of the manipulation in degrees.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性报告操作被解释为绕轴旋转的方式。The property reports the way a manipulation is interpreted as rotating around an axis. 轴通常是启动操作的两个触点点之间的点。The axis is usually the point between the two points of contact that initiated the manipulation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 该示例应用 、和 属性来移动、调整大小和旋转 。The example applies the , , and properties to move, resize, and rotate a . 本示例摘自[演练：创建您的第一个 Touch 应用程序](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application)中的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application). summary.span: 获取或设置操作已调整的作为乘数的量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount the manipulation has resized as a multiplier.
The amount the manipulation has resized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 属性都报告调整大小操作。The and properties both report a resizing manipulation. 二者之间的差异在于报告值的方式。The difference between the two is the way in which the value is reported. 属性将值报告为乘数。The property reports the value as a multiplier. 如果 为0.5，则将操作解释为将大小减小50%。If is 0.5, the manipulation is interpreted as decreasing the size by 50 percent. 如果 为2，则将操作解释为将大小增加100%。If is 2, the manipulation is interpreted as increasing the size by 100 percent. 属性在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]中报告调整大小操作。The property reports the resizing manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 该示例应用 、和 属性来移动、调整大小和旋转 。The example applies the , , and properties to move, resize, and rotate a . 本示例摘自[演练：创建您的第一个 Touch 应用程序](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application)中的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application). summary.span: 获取或设置操作的线性运动。

span.span: Gets or sets the linear motion of the manipulation.
The linear motion of the manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性报告操作被解释为在屏幕上水平和垂直移动的方式。The property reports the way a manipulation is interpreted as moving horizontally and vertically on the screen. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 该示例应用 、和 属性来移动、调整大小和旋转 。The example applies the , , and properties to move, resize, and rotate a . 本示例摘自[演练：创建您的第一个 Touch 应用程序](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application)中的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application).
